description: A field manual in music form: signal vs noise, cords vs freedom, focus vs fog, and co-creation without control.

tracks.title: Energy Game (Take / Shield / Source)
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='18' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='8' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M32 14 L32 20 M32 44 L32 50 M14 32 L20 32 M44 32 L50 32' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
tracks.takeaway: Know the hook. Don’t JADE. Exit clean. Source your energy instead of fighting for it.
tracks.sound_style: Heavy mid-tempo half-time SwampHop. Thick clean sub, minimal hats, tight snare, gritty stabs. Calm menace.

tracks.title: Signs in the Static
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M12 32 Q20 20, 28 32 T44 32' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M12 40 Q20 28, 28 40 T44 40' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
tracks.mantra: Signal feels like peace. Noise feels like need.
tracks.takeaway: Signal repeats with calm. Noise rushes and demands. Follow peace, test small, keep your breath.
tracks.sound_style: Half-time glide. Airy space, radio hiss texture, glitch-chime sparks, warm guitar bends.

tracks.title: Receipts & Ropes
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M20 20 L44 44' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='3' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M20 44 L44 20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='3' stroke-linecap='round'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='4' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
tracks.takeaway: No proving. No debating. Name the hook and choose distance.
tracks.sound_style: Crunchy bar-bounce. Heavy sub, snappy snare, minimal hats, porch/lantern tension.

tracks.title: Green Battery
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='16' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='8' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/></svg>
tracks.mantra: Energy clean— yeah, I source my light
tracks.takeaway: Stop the leaks (doomscroll, arguing, late-night spirals). Recharge in nature and craft.
tracks.sound_style: Warm half-time SwampHop. Organic ambience, wind/crickets, soulful guitar, big pockets.

tracks.title: Focus = Fire
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M32 16 L28 40 L32 48 L36 40 Z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M24 32 Q32 28, 40 32' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
tracks.mantra: Focus = fire… I light what I stare at
tracks.takeaway: One north star. One next step. Track it. Return fast. Momentum beats mood.
tracks.sound_style: Aggressive minimal half-time. Ember crackle motif, heavy sub, disciplined space, mantra hook.

tracks.title: The Observer
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='12' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5'/><path d='M32 20 L32 16 M32 44 L32 48 M20 32 L16 32 M44 32 L48 32' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='3' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
tracks.mantra: See everything… need nothing… move clean
tracks.takeaway: Scan calmly. Don’t perform. Ask one clean question. Exit with grace.
tracks.sound_style: Slow, surgical half-time. Room tone, sparse hats, deep sub, noir tension, dry voice.

tracks.title: The Co-Creator
tracks.sigil_svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 64 64' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M20 32 Q32 20, 44 32 Q32 44, 20 32' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2.5'/><path d='M32 20 L32 44' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
tracks.takeaway: Consent, plain truth, quick repair, celebrate wins. Build momentum together.
tracks.sound_style: Warm half-time bounce. Unity pad, warm guitars, thick sub, calm swagger.
